genomic_identifier.title: genomic_identifier
genomic_identifier.description: identifier for the source genomic object

num_nuc_call.title: num_nuc_call
num_nuc_call.description: Number of nucliotides called for this position

percent_nuc_call.title: percent_nuc_call
percent_nuc_call.description: Total percentage of nucleotieds at this position that matched this call

genomic_coordinate_start.title: genomic_coordinate_start
genomic_coordinate_start.description: Start position for this feature in the genome file

genomic_coordinates_end.title: genomic_coordinates_end
genomic_coordinates_end.description: End position for this feature in the genome file

protein_coordinates_start.title: protein_coordinates_start
protein_coordinates_start.description: Start position for this feature in the proteome file

protein_coordinates_end.title: protein_coordinates_end
protein_coordinates_end.description: End position for this feature in the proteome file

source.title: source
source.description: Source of genomic information in the file. From an SRA controled vocabulary: GENOMIC: [Genomic DNA (includes PCR products from genomic DNA)], TRANSCRIPTOMIC: [Transcription products or non genomic DNA (EST, cDNA, RT-PCR, screened libraries)], METAGENOMIC : [Mixed material from metagenome], METATRANSCRIPTOMIC: [Transcription products from community targets], SYNTHETIC: [Synthetic DNA], VIRAL RNA: [Viral RNA], OTHER:[Other, unspecified, or unknown library source material (please include additional info in the “design description”)]

seq_feature_tag.title: seq_feature_tag
seq_feature_tag.description: Tags associated with this feature. Can be coverage, quality|entropy, mutations,indels, tailsd, disbalance, aniusotropyu, partiality

seq_feature_value.title: seq_feature_value
seq_feature_value.description: Values for the tag associated with this feature

source_database.title: source_database
source_database.description: Source database or resource for this feature
